name: Admin Console Release 25.11.1
description: The following release of the LoginRadius Admin Console brings you a new feature and an improvement. See below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

ADDED.text: The desired Token Type (Magic Link or OTP) for various emails can be independently configured via the Admin Console's Email Templates section.

IMPROVED.text: Custom IDP (JWT) now supports configuring the JWKS Endpoint URL for ES & RS Algorithms. Additionally, Data Mapping now has the option to update the RaaS/Email profile with the values received in the social profile.
